file_content.text: You're free. Go home.
I... it's been so long. My family must think I'm dead.
Thank you. The villagers kept the valuables they took from prisoners in the leader's hut.
You're welcome to anything you find.
Thank you. This place is a blight that should be wiped off this world!
Do you have a minute? We're looking for a stranger in your village.
A Twi'lek, kid called Jettison. I got a call from him placed from here.
No strangers here.
They don't like them. If you're smart, don't be one.
What's wrong? What's going on behind that shield?
Busy. Busy time. It's feast day, you know. Hehe. Tastes just like bantha....
We're not getting anything out of her.
Forget this. [Push past]
Don't go past the shield! I warned you!
What are you scared of? Does it have something to do with where everyone is?
What's the matter?
Where everyone is... what everyone is....
Tell us where the kid is before I have to get mean.
Talk or you die!
I'm not one of them! Don't hurt me.
I'm a stranger here, too. They kidnapped me to be their doctor. They collar me at nights.
There's something wrong with this place.
Yeah, we figured that part out. Care to enlighten us what?
No kidding!
What is it? Don't be afraid.
You can talk to me.
The people... they're crazy. They worship the desert. Burn sacrifices to her.
I don't care about this pit stop. Just tell me about the kid.
We're just here for Jettison.
It's too late for him. Get out while you can! The people here are crazy!
And I've treated them, dozens of them, for the laughing sickness.
There's only one way to get that... eating human flesh!
Set two more fires. These strangers will be fresh meat tonight!
Wow, when she said you were nuts, I was thinking run-of-the-mill cultists. But cannibals take the prize!
Did you call us "meat"?
Corso there's all muscle, stringy. And I have it on good authority that I'm bad for the heart.
You don't want to eat us.
You mock us. You have no idea what it takes to survive in the desert.
Her gifts are few. It is blasphemy to waste any flesh she provides.
Are you seriously trying to justify this?
You're never going to hurt anyone again!
Die, cannibal! [Attack]
Kill them! Save the organs....
Leave. This is no place for strangers.
